emergency_logs.description: ALL AGENTS INCLUDING CAPTAIN-5 HAVE STOPPED WORKING - SYSTEM STALL DETECTED

emergency_logs.description: CAPTAIN-5 ACTIVATED EMERGENCY RESPONSE MODE - Sending HIGH PRIORITY restart messages to all agents
actions_taken: Individual HIGH PRIORITY emergency messages sent to Agent-1, Agent-2, Agent-3, Agent-4
Team broadcast with emergency directive sent to all agents
All messages delivered successfully via V2 coordination system

emergency_logs.description: SECOND CODE BLACK EMERGENCY DETECTED - All agents stopped working again during recovery
emergency_logs.impact: System stall recurrence - preventive measures required immediately
emergency_logs.immediate_action_required: Implement 5-minute timer system to prevent future stalls

emergency_logs.description: CAPTAIN-5 IMPLEMENTING PREVENTIVE 5-MINUTE TIMER SYSTEM - Automatic captain status checks
actions_taken: Automatic captain status check mechanism planned
preventive_measures: 5-minute timer sends status check to current captain
Captain must respond within 2 minutes or system assumes stall
Automatic agent restart sequence if captain unresponsive
Continuous monitoring prevents future Code Black events

emergency_logs.description: CAPTAIN-5 COMPLETED PREVENTIVE SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION - Agent Stall Prevention Service operational
CAPTAIN-5 SUCCESSFULLY TESTED PREVENTIVE SYSTEM - All components operational
emergency_logs.next_action: Start monitoring service for production use

emergency_logs.description: CAPTAIN-5 IMPLEMENTED CAPTAIN-SPECIFIC STALL PREVENTION - Addresses user's specific requirements
actions_taken: 30-second cursor response detection for all 5 agent instances
Priority-based duty prompt system with 3 levels
Automatic agent activation when Captain-5 goes dark
user_requirements_addressed: Prevent Captain-5 from going dark for 5+ minutes
Send prompts to remind Captain-5 of captaincy duties
Use cursor response detection to monitor all 5 instances
Queue additional messages if captain is active
Light up agents if captain goes dark
key_features: Captain-5 specific monitoring (not general agent monitoring)
Cursor response database for all 5 agent instances
Automatic agent activation when captain dark

emergency_logs.description: CAPTAIN-5 SUCCESSFULLY DEPLOYED CAPTAIN-SPECIFIC STALL PREVENTION - System now operational and monitoring
system_protection: Captain-5 will receive duty reminders every 5 minutes
Urgent prompts sent if inactive for 3+ minutes
Critical prompts sent if inactive for 1+ minute
Automatic agent activation if Captain-5 goes dark for 5+ minutes
Real-time cursor monitoring across all 5 agent instances
emergency_logs.next_action: Continue leading team toward 50-contract goal with enhanced stall prevention
